description: Calling all movie fans! Get your ringtones of FUN movie sounds and phrases!   This ringtone application is a great value. Purchasing this application gives you the complete Movie Mania Collection, PLUS full access to NEW ringtones that we will continue to add to this fabulous collection in the future. No subscription fees. No cost per download. Unlimited downloads guaranteed.   THE MOVIE MANIA COLLECTION:  • Are you a big fan of Action Movies? There are great tones from action packed movies like “Transformers” and the epic movie “300”, among others.  • Looking for a good laugh? Hilarious lines from the comedy “Bruno” and the funny “Mr. Bean” will always keep the laughter rolling.   • If Horror Movies are your thing, there are numerous chilling tones of Jigsaw from the “Saw” movies.  •  All of these great ringtones and a lot MORE are available in this star-studded collection!    ABOUT MOVIE MANIA APP:  • UNLIMITED downloads  • Access to NEW Movie Mania tones we will continue to add in the future    • Pay once, no subscription fees  • Set a unique ringtone for each caller in your phonebook  NOTE: We highly recommend that you have WiFi or good network connection in order to experience the full functionality of this app.
